mapper.select:
select process_id processId, process_code processCode, process_name processName, process_remark processRemark, process_status processStatus, process_cron processCron, cron_calibration cronCalibration, every_day_start_flag everyDayStartFlag, execute_max executeMax, process_limittime processLimittime
from py_process t where t.disable = '1'
